fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors

Class AbstractDataTwoWayConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractTwoWayConnector<DataTwoWayI>
        • fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractDataTwoWayConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectorI, DataTwoWayConnectorI, ComponentServiceI, DataTwoWayI, OfferedI, RequiredI, TwoWayI, java.rmi.Remote
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataTwoWayConnector

    public abstract class AbstractDataTwoWayConnector
extends AbstractTwoWayConnector<DataTwoWayI>
implements DataTwoWayConnectorI
    The class AbstractDataTwoWayConnector partially implements a basic data connector between components exchanging data in a peer to peer way rather than calling each others services.

    Description

    This basic implementation of the DataTwoWayConnectorI simply assumes that the class representing the data to be exchanged implements both data interfaces of the two data two-way interfaces.

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2012-01-24

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      • second2first

        public DataTwoWayI.DataI second2first(DataTwoWayI.DataI d)

        Description

        This implementation of the method assumes that the concrete data class implements both DataI interfaces. Subclasses should redefine if this assumption is not true.

        Contract

         pre    true                            // no more preconditions.
 post   true                            // no more postconditions.
        Specified by:
        second2first in interface DataTwoWayConnectorI
        Parameters:
        d - data to be translated
        Returns:
        data resulting from the translation

      • connect

        public void connect(OfferedI peer1,
                    RequiredI peer2)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        connect data two way ports.

        Contract

         pre    peer1 instanceof DataTwoWayI.PullI
 pre    peer1 instanceof DataTwoWayI.PushI
 pre    peer2 instanceof DataTwoWayI.PullI
 pre    peer2 instanceof DataTwoWayI.PushI
 post   true                            // no more postconditions.
        Specified by:
        connect in interface ConnectorI
        Overrides:
        connect in class AbstractTwoWayConnector<DataTwoWayI>
        Parameters:
        peer1 - in port of the component implementing the offered interface.
        peer2 - out port of the component requiring the required interface.
